word: H7034 - קָלָה - qâlâh - kaw-law' - Base - இழிவான

sections.paragraph: வினைச்சொல் - சீரழிந்துபோ, அற்பமாய், எண்ணப்படு, நீசனாய்த் தோன்று, கனமற்றவன், கீழ்மகன், தூஷி
to disgrace, to dishonor, to be lightly esteemed, to be dishonored, to be despised
a) (Niphal) to be dishonored, to be despised, to be lightly esteemed
b) (Hiphil) to treat with contempt, to dishonor, to treat shamefully

ஆங்கில மூலம் / Original in English: A primitive root; to be light (as implied in rapid motion), but figuratively only (be (causatively hold) in contempt): - base, contemn, despise, lightly esteem, set light, seem vile.
Cognate: H7034, H7036, H7037
